dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
3 bar scales on map given in "Milles hebraiques", "Milles romains", and "Lieues d'une heure".
Shows topography, drainage, settlements, boundaries of the Tribes of Israel, places of historical interest.
Decorative cartouche with people and a well.
Appears in Louis Brion de la Tour's Atlas général civil et ecclésiastique, Paris, 1766.
